name: How can I export personal and survey data together?
title: How can I export personal and survey data together?
body:
Overview

This article explains the process and requirements for exporting personal and survey data together in Tivian's survey platform, addressing data protection concerns and necessary permissions.

 

Information

Combining personal and survey data requires special permissions due to data protection regulations. This guide outlines the steps to obtain the necessary rights for combined data export.

 

  • Data Protection and Combined Export
  • Obtaining Export Rights
  • Application Process

 

Data Protection and Combined Export

For data protection reasons, combining personal and survey data is not possible by default. Test users or respondents must be informed in advance if their personal data will be linked to their survey responses.

 

Obtaining Export Rights

To enable the combined export of personal and survey data, an extra right is required. This right is not activated by default and must be specifically requested.

 

Application Process

Step 1: Complete the Application

The licensee (person or entity who ordered/purchased the license) must complete and sign an application for combined data export.

Step 2: Submit the Application

Return the completed application to Tivian for processing.

Step 3: Account Verification

For legal reasons, activation can only be performed for accounts that are members of just one team. The team should be stated in the application.

Step 4: Rights Activation

Upon approval, the combined export right will be activated for all members of the specified team.

 

FAQ

Where can I find the application form?

The application form for combined data export can be found in Tivian's download area.

Will all team members receive the combined export right?

Yes, when activated, all members of the specified team will be granted this right. It's important to consider whether this aligns with the licensee's interests, especially for teams with multiple members.

Can accounts with multiple team memberships apply for this right?

No, for legal reasons, the combined export right can only be activated for accounts that are members of a single team.
